name: Tales of Tsuki - Moon Guardians
description:
Tales Of Tsuki - Moon Guardians
Discover the Mysteries Of the Moon Goddess

Follow the journey of Miyuki and her fellow priestesses of the goddess Tsuki on an exciting adventure through the lands of Getsuga, fighting fierce monsters and exploring the locations and meeting the characters in this mystical land full of mysteries and wonders where an ancient evil roams the shadows trying to destroy this world.

Meet the inhabitants from Gestuga




Determine the direction of the story through dialogues


Overcome the various challenges ahead of you through combat minigames.
